Project_Type: Development of AI-Powered Chatbot for Customer Support

Objectives: Improve response time to customer queries
Collect feedback and generate analytics for continuous improvement
Scope.Description: Develop an AI-powered chatbot to enhance customer support services, integrating with the website and mobile application

Deliverables: Design, development, and deployment of a chatbot system
Integration with existing CRM and ticketing systems
Ongoing maintenance and support for 12 months
Required_Skills: Proven experience in AI and chatbot development
Demonstrated ability to integrate with third-party applications

Tasks: Design, develop, and deploy a chatbot system
Integrate with existing CRM and ticketing systems
Provide training and documentation for staff
Offer ongoing maintenance and support for 12 months
